Activity: Log in to the EHR system, review overnight reports, and check email for any urgent requests or notifications.
Assist with influenza vaccination clinics. Administer vaccines and document vaccination status in the EHR. Talk to the old to help alleviate their concerns.
Perform patient assessments and EHR data entry, focusing on patients presenting with influenza-like symptoms. Be patient to those anxious patients.
Lunch Break. Meet up with friends for lunch at a nearby cafe. A big meal could do a lot for me!
Review lab results and imaging reports related to influenza cases. Document findings in the EHR and communicate with physicians as needed.
Participate in a team meeting to discuss challenges and best practices related to influenza management. @clinlead-1 might be a good person to seek for help.
Complete end-of-day documentation and prepare for tomorrow's schedule. Make sure no patient's health conditions are missed.
